collectible.title: Skirt
collectible.subtitle: Haru's skirt
collectible.text: The skirt Haru wore to the game. It isn't the one from her days at Shujin Academy, but it is very similiar. The question is; would you prefer it on or off when she's sitting on your face?
collectible.unlock: Win against Haru. Note that playing against a certain character will unlock a different collectible instead.

collectible.title: Grenade Launcher
collectible.subtitle: The weapon of a fair lady.
collectible.text: The fair lady of the Phantom Thieves loved to blow up her enemies with her trusty grenade launcher! Her fondness for explosions could have her forge a bond with a certain mage.
collectible.unlock: Win against both Haru and Megumin.
